duties_responsibilities.duty: Communicate with customers' technical requirements and recommend suitable technical solutions to support the achievement of sales goals.
Establish relationships with the sales team, internal engineers, and key technical customer contacts.
Utilize in-depth knowledge of customers' business to position company solutions effectively versus competition.

Demonstrate strong operating experience in at least one area of specialization: Software (OS and application) development, RFID, Mobile Computing, Advanced Data Capture, Mobility Software applications, Wide Area Network (WAN & WWAN) Technologies, wired and wireless networking technologies, RF and network security.
Use competitive knowledge in the area(s) of specialization including solutions, technology, and product offerings.
Understand and be conversant about the company, competitors, technologies, solutions, product strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in relevant field (Master's preferred)
